ISSUE.TITLE: Upgrade version of Bootstrap used by OAI-PMH interface (for human display of output)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: OAI-PMH (dspace-oai) is currently using Bootstrap v3.0.2 which is outdated (see `dspace-oai/src/main/resources/static/js/bootstrap.js`). Additionally LGTM is reporting possible security issues with the `bootstrap.js`. See the **last two** issues in this list: https://lgtm.com/projects/g/DSpace/DSpace/?mode=list&tag=security Ideally, we'd upgrade minimally to Bootstrap v3.4.1 (the latest 3.x release), but we also could upgrade to v4.5 (the latest release) if no major effort is required.
